#
# .chatfilter.txt
# This file stores the macro templates for the chat filter module. Do not edit this file.
#

# Filter for config []
Filter[].Script=IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "EcoDollars");<BR />setlabel(balance, %CHATCLEAN%)<BR />FILTER()<BR />ENDIF();<BR />ENDIF();<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "There is currently");<BR />&inpot = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />REPLACE(&inpot, "[LOTTERY] There is currently ", "")<BR />REPLACE(&inpot, ".", "")<BR />setlabel(pot, %&inpot%)<BR />ENDIF();<BR /><BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "Draw in:");<BR />@&timeleft = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />REPLACE(@&timeleft, "[LOTTERY] Draw in: ", "")<BR />setlabel(time, %@&timeleft%)<BR />ENDIF();<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "Just bought");<BR />LOG(%CHAT%)<BR />ENDIF();<BR />ifmatches(%CHATCLEAN%, "Congratulations go to")<BR />ifmatches(%CHATCLEAN%, "for winning")<BR />LOG(%CHAT%)<BR />set(@#lottowin, 1)<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "LOTTERY");<BR />FILTER()<BR />ENDIF();<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "ScarabCoder:");<BR />ELSE()<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "scarab")<BR />LOG(&4Someone mentioned you!)<BR />playsound(random.levelup)<BR />ENDIF()<BR />ENDIF();<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "From")<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, ": ")<BR />playsound(random.levelup)<BR />ENDIF()<BR />ENDIF() <BR />if(@#afk == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "From ")<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, ": ")<BR />&message = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(&message, "From ")<BR />EhCHO("/mail send ScarabCoder " %&message%)<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "has been online")<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "Roanmara")<BR />FILTER()<BR />SETLABEL(Roanmara, "Roanmara")<BR />ENDIF()<BR />IFMATCHES(%CHATCLEAN%, "haydensch")<BR />SETLABEL(haydensch, "&4haydensch")<BR />FILTER()<BR />ENDIF()<BR />ENDIF()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Unknown command")<BR />if(%@#filterm% == 1)<BR />set(@#filterm, 0)<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR /><BR /><BR />if(@#blockchat == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Region:")<BR />@&region = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(@&region, "Region: ")<BR />replace(@&region, " (type=cuboid, priority=0)")<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Bounds:")<BR />@#blockchat = 0<BR />@#block2 = 1<BR />echo("/seen %HITNAME%)<BR /><BR /><BR /><BR /><BR />endif()<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />if(@#block2 == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"Player ")<BR />@#block2 = 0<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, " has been online")<BR />ECHO("/rg addmember %@&region% %HITNAME%")<BR />log(&aAdded %HITNAME% to %@&region%)<BR />else<BR />log(&4Error! Player not found)<BR />endif()<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />ifendswith(%CHATCLEAN%, "ScarabCoder: Queryback")<BR />ECHO("/msg ScarabCoder I am using Automatic region adding")<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Any names suffixed")<BR />filter()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR /><BR /><BR />if(@#blocklwc == 1)<BR />if(%CHATCLEAN% == "/lwc")<BR />@#blocklwc = 0<BR />filter()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />if(@#click == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Punch a protection")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />if(%CHATCLEAN% == "")<BR />filter()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Owner: ")<BR />@&owner = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(&owner, "Owner: ")<BR />FILTER()<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Protection type:")<BR />@#click = 0<BR />@#world = 1<BR />echo("/whereami")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />if(@#world == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Current World: ")<BR />@&world = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(@&world, "Current World: ")<BR /><BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Pitch: ")<BR />@#world = 0<BR />@#rg = 1<BR />echo("/rg i")<BR />endif()<BR />filter()<BR />endif()<BR />if(@#rg == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Region: ")<BR />@&region = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(@&region, " (type=cuboid, priority=0)")<BR />replace(@&region, "Region: ")<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Bounds: ")<BR />@#rg = 0<BR /><BR />logto("lwcremove.txt","What is your in-game name?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", %PLAYER%)<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Have you read the in-depth instructions for this application?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Yes")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "What world is this protection in:")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "%@&world%")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Are we removing LWC Protections or trade signs?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "LWC Protection")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "What town is this protection in?")<BR /><BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "They are in %@&region% application URL here")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Whose is this protection?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "%@&owner%")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Is the player who owns this inactive? Have you tried contacting them about removing the lock?")<BR /><BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Player inactive")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Where is this protection?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "/tppos %XPOS% %YPOS% %ZPOS% %YAW% %PITCH%")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "(Note to admins: The above command can be copied and pasted ingame. Includes directional TP")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Is this protection in a PvP area?")<BR /><BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "No")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Why are you requesting this to be removed?")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt", "Protection is in the way and I am cleaning up")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt","--------------------END AUTO-GENERATED TEXT---------------")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt","")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt","")<BR />logto("lwcremove.txt","")<BR />log(&aRemoval request generated! Go to your minecraft folder, .minecraft/liteconfig/commmon/macromod/logs/lwcremove.txt)<BR />log(&aYou will need to scroll to the bottom to copy the text)<BR />log(&aClick this link to file a report:)<BR />log("https://www.ecocitycraft.com/forum/forums/staff-requests.44/create-thread")<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "From ")<BR />ifendswith(%CHATCLEAN%, "Toggle messages")<BR />toggle(@#messages)<BR />echo("/r Lotto messages toggled!")<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[].Counters=amount=1,t=0,size=2,players=0,mycounter=0,add2=1
Filter[].String[add]=21.20
Filter[].String[owner]=BuildsByGideon (0214e251-b01b-4c86-934c-35ec95ae724a) 
Filter[].String[amount]=[LOTTERY] There is currently $5100 in the pot.
Filter[].String[test]=[hello, hello]
Filter[].String[inpot]=$0 in the pot
Filter[].String[timeleft]=33 seconds
Filter[].String[message]=techy88: if you want it for your own personal use that's fine but into caht would be disruptive

# Filter for config [Erep]
Filter[Erep].Script=<BR />&chat = lcase(%CHATCLEAN%)<BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "from")<BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "erep")<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "can")<BR /><BR />ECHo("/r Sure, want me to tp?") <BR /><BR />echo("/r")<BR />#mute = 1<BR />#tp = 1<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />if(#tp == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "y")<BR /><BR /><BR />LOG(%&player%)<BR /><BR />#tp = 0<BR />else<BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "sure")<BR /><BR />LOG(%&player%)<BR /><BR />#tp = 0<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%&chat%, "now chatting with")<BR />if(#mute == 1)<BR />&player = %&chat%<BR />replace(&player, "now chatting with ")<BR />replace(&player, ".")<BR />#mute = 0<BR />filter()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[Erep].Counters=mute=0,tp=0
Filter[Erep].String[chat]=to madmonster_: sent
Filter[Erep].String[player]=madmonster_

# Filter for config [Job]
Filter[Job].Script=if(%@#cinfo% == 1)<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"Punch a protection")<BR />LOG("Please left-click the protection")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"Owner: ")<BR />@&owner = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(@&owner, "Owner: ", "")<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"Protection type: ")<BR />&type = %HITNAME%<BR />@#cinfo = 0<BR />@#where = 1<BR /><BR />ECHO("/whereami")<BR /><BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"Access Control List")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />if(%CHATCLEAN% == "")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%,"None! ")<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR /><BR /><BR />if(@#where == 1)<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Current World: ")<BR />&world = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(&world, "Current World: ", "")<BR />FILTER()<BR /><BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "X: ")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Y: ")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Z: ")<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Yaw: ")<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Pitch: ")<BR /><BR /><BR />@#where = 0<BR />@#region = 1<BR />ECHO("/rg i")<BR /><BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />endif()<BR /><BR /><BR />if(@#region == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "suffixed")<BR />@#region = 0<BR />LOGTO("lwcremoval.txt", "Automically generated text, please clear text file when done copying")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "You will also need to fill in some places")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", " ")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", " ")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "0. What world is this town in? " %&world%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "1. What is your ingame name? " %PLAYER%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "2. What town are the protections in (Please state the name of the town and link the original town app)?" %&regionname% " http://www.ecocitycraft.com/forum/threads/mayor-application.128867/")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "3. Are these locks in a PvP Zone? No")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "4. Are you the mayor or co-mayor? Co-Mayor")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "5. What are the co-ordinates of the protection: (DO NOT POST SCREENSHOTS, type them out please)")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "X:" %XPOS%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "Y:" %YPOS%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "Z:" %ZPOS%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "6. Whose protections are these? (Use /cinfo to find out) " %@&owner%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "7. Does the town have the interact flag set to deny? If so, is the owner of these locks still added as a town member? yes and yes")<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "8. What kind of protections are these? (doors, chests, signs etc.): "%&type%)<BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "9. How many protections are we removing? 1")<BR /><BR />logto("lwcremoval.txt", "10. Is this user banned from the server? If not, have you tried to contact them about removing their things? User offline longer then a month")<BR />LOGTO("lwcremoval.txt", "11. Why do you want it gone/reasons? cleanup/in the way")<BR />LOG("LWC Request generated! To find it, go to your /liteconfig/common/macros/logs ")<BR />log("in your .minecraft folder for generated txt file")<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Region: ")<BR />&regionname = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(&regionname, "Region: ", "")<BR />replace(&regionname, " (type=cuboid, priority=0)")<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR /><BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[Job].String[owner]=ScarabCoder (012ca32d-ad51-4f34-b68c-7b69a7960bac) 
Filter[Job].String[world]=rising
Filter[Job].String[cinfo]=true
Filter[Job].String[regionname]=hayland
Filter[Job].String[type]=Chest

# Filter for config [Lock Macro]
Filter[Lock Macro].Script=<BR />if(@#rg == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Any names")<BR />LOG("END")<BR />@#rg = 0<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Members:")<BR />@&vars = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />replace(@&vars, "Members:", "")<BR />REPLACE(@&vars, " ", "")<BR />replace(@&vars, "*", "")<BR />&vargroups2[] = split(",","%@&vars%");<BR />#length = arraysize(&vargroups2)<BR />for(#i, 0, %#length%)<BR />LOG(%&vargroups2[%#i%]%)<BR />Next()<BR />LOOP()<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Bounds")<BR />@#mb = 0<BR />endif()<BR />if(@#mb == 1)<BR />@&vars1 = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />REPLACE(@&vars1, " ", "")<BR />replace(@&vars1, "*", "")<BR />&vargroups2[] = split(",","%@&vars%");<BR /><BR />&test2[] = join(&vargroups, &vargroups2)<BR />#size1 = arraysize(&vargroups)<BR />#size2 = arraysize(&test2)<BR />LOG(%&test2%)<BR />endif()<BR /><BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[Lock Macro].Counters=size=26,size1=23,size2=2,length=23,i=0
Filter[Lock Macro].String[members1]=abpizza*,AdmiralD*,agentplutonium*,alex101911*,AlexGIF*,Andiesis*,BalisticVin*,Bernt_Toast*,BuildsByGideon*,ceskykure*,icecream0886*,j90rdn*,Janelle5845*,KEVINwelch2001*,lucasmay11*,MasterPharom*,Moonotter701*,Obblebobble*,Roanmara*,ScarabCoder*,Sickidd*,Strechies*,twingirlaimee*

# Filter for config [Lotto Macro]
Filter[Lotto Macro].Script=if(@#lotto == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "[LOTTERY] Draw in: ")<BR />&timeleft = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />setlabel(lotto, %&timeleft%)<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "[LOTTERY] Last Winner: ")<BR />@#lotto = 0<BR />endif()<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[Lotto Macro].String[timeleft]=[LOTTERY] Draw in: 46 seconds

# Filter for config [Lotto Reminder]
Filter[Lotto Reminder].Script=if(@#lotto == 1)<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Draw in:")<BR />&timeleft = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />REPLACE(&timeleft, "[LOTTERY] Draw in: ", "")<BR />setlabel("time", %&timeleft%)<BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "There is currently")<BR />&pot = %CHATCLEAN%<BR />REPLACE(&pot, "[LOTTERY] There is currently ", "")<BR />REPLACE(&pot, ".", "")<BR />setlabel("pot", %&pot%)<BR />endif()<BR />Ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "Last winner: ")<BR />@#lotto = 0<BR /><BR />endif()<BR />ifcontains(%CHATCLEAN%, "LOTTERY")<BR />FILTER()<BR />endif()<BR />endif()<BR />
Filter[Lotto Reminder].String[pot]=$0 in the pot
Filter[Lotto Reminder].String[inpot]=$850 in the pot
Filter[Lotto Reminder].String[timeleft]=9 minutes, and 49 seconds
